title: Sweet Red Pepper-beet Soup
summary: Sweet Red Pepper-beet Soup is a gluten free soup. This recipe serves 8 and costs $2.09 per serving. One portion of this dish contains about 9g of protein, 9g of fat, and a total of 161 calories. This recipe is liked by 4 foodies and cooks. A mixture of shallots, water, lemon wedges, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. It will be a hit at your Autumn event. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 1 hour and 10 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 80%. This score is great. Try 5-Minute Roasted Red Pepper Dip, roasted tomato and red pepper dip, and Easy Roasted Red Pepper Dip for similar recipes.
instructions: Remove saucepan from heat, and let cool slightly. Stir in lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper. Working in batches, puree mixture in a blender until smooth. Transfer to a large bowl, and refrigerate until chilled, up to overnight.

steps.step: Remove saucepan from heat, and let cool slightly. Stir in lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper. Working in batches, puree mixture in a blender until smooth.
Transfer to a large bowl, and refrigerate until chilled, up to overnight.
